fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Splash water in someone's face, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, it is revealed that "It seems to be a great day to go fishing."
- Each night, people may choose to cast a fishing line, and name a number from 1 to x, where x is the number of people in the game. You will also name a number from 1 to x. If exactly one person guesses your number correctly, they will catch you. If multiple people guess correctly, you will not be caught and these people will be informed "You felt a tug on the line, but it was someone else's hook!" 
- If you are caught, you will gain a private chat with whoever caught you. You do not learn which faction they are part of.
- You cannot be caught if you are dead. When you are dead, the town will be informed that "The waters seem still. There seems to be no more fish in the water."

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with the most recent person to catch you. You do not be alive for this.
